# Svirfneblin Magic Items
## Overview
The articles in this grouping comprise the new [[Svirfneblin|svirfneblin]] magic items introduced in *[[Underworld Races and Classes]]*. See the list of Governed Content on the right for a complete list of names and links.

- [[Gem Protector]]
